name: Accumulated Knowledge
oracle_text: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of cards named Accumulated Knowledge in all graveyards.
flavor_text:
"I have seen and heard much here. There are secrets within secrets. Let me show you."
—Takara, to Eladamri

name: Air Bladder
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: Random mutations among Rootwater merfolk were common—and disturbing.

name: Belbe's Percher
oracle_text:
Flying
Belbe's Percher can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text: Long and powerful, these birds were used to carry messages to and from the evincar.

name: Blastoderm
oracle_text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

name: Bola Warrior
oracle_text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: The ingredients for panic include equal parts danger, uncertainty, and helplessness.

name: Cloudskate
oracle_text:
Flying
Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

name: Defender en-Vec
oracle_text:
Fading 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Remove a fade counter from Defender en-Vec: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

name: Defiant Falcon
oracle_text:
Flying
{4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

name: Downhill Charge
oracle_text:
You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Mountains you control.

name: Fanatical Devotion
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate target creature.
flavor_text: The Oracle told Eladamri he would save his people by abandoning them. His followers adopted that ideal.

name: Flame Rift
oracle_text: Flame Rift deals 4 damage to each player.
flavor_text: Crovax hungered for power, and the stronghold devoured the sky.

name: Flowstone Crusher
oracle_text: {R}: Flowstone Crusher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Someone must have done something very bad to make a rock that angry."
—Rebel scout

name: Flowstone Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/-1 and gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: Aggression exacts its toll.

name: Flowstone Wall
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{R}: Flowstone Wall gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The rebels assaulted the wall, never suspecting the wall would assault back.

name: Fog Patch
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during the declare blockers step.
Attacking creatures become blocked. (This spell works on creatures that can't be blocked.)
flavor_text: Realizing they weren't getting past the fog, the elves did the only thing they could do: wait.

name: Harvest Mage
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Until end of turn, if you tap a land for mana, it produces one mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type and amount.
flavor_text: "Why should one limit oneself to the resources at hand?"

name: Infiltrate
oracle_text: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: Getting in was the easy part. Getting out proved to be more difficult.

name: Laccolith Grunt
oracle_text: Whenever Laccolith Grunt becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Grunt assigns no combat damage this turn.
flavor_text: They leave a trail of ash and sorrow.

name: Laccolith Rig
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, the first creature assigns no combat damage this turn.

name: Laccolith Whelp
oracle_text: Whenever Laccolith Whelp becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Laccolith Whelp assigns no combat damage this turn.
flavor_text: They don't feed; they stoke.

name: Lashknife
oracle_text:
If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has first strike.
flavor_text: Those it won't scare, it scars.

name: Lawbringer
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Lawbringer: Exile target red creature.
flavor_text:
One injustice starts a thousand riots. One law stops a thousand crimes.
—Lawbringer creed

name: Lightbringer
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Lightbringer: Exile target black creature.
flavor_text:
One thought opens a thousand eyes. One sun brings a thousand dawns.
—Lightbringer creed

name: Mind Swords
oracle_text:
If you control a Swamp, you may sacrifice a creature rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Each player exiles two cards from their hand.

name: Mogg Toady
oracle_text:
Mogg Toady can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player.
Mogg Toady can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.

name: Mossdog
oracle_text: Whenever Mossdog becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, put a +1/+1 counter on Mossdog.
flavor_text: The more you look at it, the more dangerous it becomes.

name: Netter en-Dal
oracle_text: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature can't attack this turn.
flavor_text: The wizard's vocabulary of mogg profanities increased with every net she cast.

name: Off Balance
oracle_text: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
flavor_text: A heavy weapon deals plenty of damage—but it does have to hit.

name: Oraxid
oracle_text: Protection from red
flavor_text:
"I'm constantly amazed by the tenacity of living creatures on this plane. Even in the stronghold's white-hot core, life persists."
—Ertai

name: Parallax Dementia
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Fading 1 (This enchantment enters the battlefield with one fade counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
Enchanted creature gets +3/+2.
When Parallax Dementia leaves the battlefield, destroy enchanted creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

name: Phyrexian Driver
oracle_text: When Phyrexian Driver enters the battlefield, other Mercenary creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Although the abuse was initially effective, the troops soon became numb to it.

name: Plague Witch
oracle_text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I can ail what cures you."

name: Rathi Intimidator
oracle_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
{2}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with mana value 2 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

name: Reverent Silence
oracle_text:
If you control a Forest, rather than pay this spell's mana cost, you may have each other player gain 6 life.
Destroy all enchantments.

name: Rootwater Commando
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text: Rootwater merfolk are seldom seen these days, but elf corpses are as numerous as ever.

name: Seal of Cleansing
oracle_text: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"I am the purifier, the light that clears all shadows."
—Seal inscription

name: Seal of Doom
oracle_text: Sacrifice Seal of Doom: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"I am the banisher, the ill will that snuffs the final candle."
—Seal inscription

name: Seal of Fire
oracle_text: Sacrifice Seal of Fire: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"I am the romancer, the passion that consumes the flesh."
—Seal inscription

name: Seal of Removal
oracle_text: Sacrifice Seal of Removal: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"I am the unraveler, the loosened thread that will not hold."
—Seal inscription

name: Seal of Strength
oracle_text: Sacrifice Seal of Strength: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I am the feeder, the morsel that revives the starving."
—Seal inscription

name: Silkenfist Fighter
oracle_text: Whenever Silkenfist Fighter becomes blocked, untap it.
flavor_text: Simple wooden staff Made from life, protecting life, Stronger than cold steel.

name: Skyshroud Claim
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The forest's constant struggle is to keep the spreading flowstone at bay.

name: Skyshroud Cutter
oracle_text: If you control a Forest, rather than pay this spell's mana cost, you may have each other player gain 5 life.

name: Skyshroud Ridgeback
oracle_text: Fading 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

name: Skyshroud Sentinel
oracle_text: When Skyshroud Sentinel enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Skyshroud Sentinel, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Sneaky Homunculus
oracle_text: Sneaky Homunculus can't block or be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.
flavor_text: Keep watch only for the giants and you'll be eaten by the ants.

name: Spineless Thug
oracle_text: Spineless Thug can't block.
flavor_text: These troops are only as strong as the evincar's control.

name: Spiteful Bully
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Spiteful Bully deals 3 damage to target creature you control.
flavor_text: Like most creatures bent on total destruction, they rarely bother to double-check their targets.

name: Stronghold Discipline
oracle_text: Each player loses 1 life for each creature they control.
flavor_text:
"Crovax never passes up an opportunity to cause widespread misery."
—Belbe

name: Topple
oracle_text: Exile target creature with the greatest power among creatures on the battlefield. (If two or more creatures are tied for greatest power, target any one of them.)
flavor_text:
"Let all witness the fate of those who defy me."
—Crovax

name: Treetop Bracers
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
flavor_text: Gravity is truly what you make of it.

name: Trickster Mage
oracle_text: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
flavor_text: "If it ain't broke, I'll break it. If it *is* broke, I'll fix it."

name: Vicious Hunger
oracle_text: Vicious Hunger deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Blood is foul, the flesh dross. My ascendance thirsts for life itself."
—Crovax

name: Wandering Eye
oracle_text:
Flying
Players play with their hands revealed.
flavor_text: The evincar has many ways of keeping track of his subjects.
